News.headline: Match & Match Ball Sponsorship and Advertsing Boards Still Available
News.page_title: Match & Match Ball Sponsorship and Advertsing Boards Still Available
News.URL_keywords: Match & Match Ball Sponsorship and Advertsing Boards Still Available
News.short_description: Match Sponsorship, Matchball sponsorship, Matchday Hospitality and Executive Box aswell as Advertisng Boards are still available at the Daggers.
News.description:
With fixtures at the Chigwell Construction Stadium coming in thick and fast in the coming months Match and Match ball Sponsorships are the perfect way to enhance the experience of our commercial customers or supporters looking for a special day out. 

Our Hospitality dining is offered to both home and away fans and is included in all of our match day sponsorship packages, hospitality includes:

•Three course meal.
•Complimentary match day programmes and team sheet.
•Half time refreshments.
•Seats in the sponsor’s box.

We also still have available several advertising boards for businesses looking to advertise around the stadium, it's a perfect way to reach a large captive audience at the match, on television and online. 

For more information please email us at commercial@daggers.co.uk or call into the office on 02085921549 extension: 33.
